creditline: Gift of Allegra and Paul Parker
description: frowning, balding man with beard holding a staff (?) under his PR arm and holding up a large shrimp with his PL hand; water and grasses at bottom
markings: \'Shojo\', in black ink, L edge near center; seal, in red, below signature
text: The semi-legendary 9th-century Chinese priest Xianzi (Jap. Kensu 蜆子) is catching a shrimp that he is going to eat in conflict with Zen Buddhism.
title: Priest Xianzi (Kensu) Catching a Shrimp
